birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国河南省商城县夹河区九斗冲
birth_place.en: Jiudouchong, Jiahe District, Shangcheng County, Henan, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国武汉市

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，1955年获一级八一勋章、一级独立自由勋章、一级解放勋章。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who was awarded the First Class Medal of Bayi, the First Class Medal of Independence and Freedom, and the First Class Medal of Liberation in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

en: 4th Detachment of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 新四军下属的一支部队。
description.en: A subordinate unit of the New Fourth Army.

en: 3rd Detachment of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 新四军下属的一支部队。
description.en: A subordinate unit of the New Fourth Army.

en: 7th Division of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 新四军下属的一支部队。
description.en: A subordinate unit of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七个大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的十三个大军区之一。
description.en: One of the thirteen former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防委员会
en: National Defense Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1975年间中华人民共和国的国家军事机关。
description.en: The state military organ of the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1975.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省信阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Xinyang City, Henan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省省会。
description.en: The capital of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 林维先出生于河南省商城县。
description.en: Lin Weixian was born in Shangcheng County, Henan Province.

description.zh-cn: 林维先于1932年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Lin Weixian joined the Communist Party of China in 1932.

description.zh-cn: 林维先是中国人民解放军中将。
description.en: Lin Weixian was a Lieutenant General in the People's Liberation Army.

position.zh-cn: 第74师特务连指导员、第220团1营政治委员、团政治委员
position.en: Instructor of the Special Service Company of the 74th Division, Political Commissar of the 1st Battalion of the 220th Regiment, and Regiment Political Commissar

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾在红二十五军任职。
description.en: Lin Weixian held positions in the 25th Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾任红八十二师师长。
description.en: Lin Weixian served as the Division Commander of the 82nd Red Division.

position.en: Staff Officer of the Army Headquarters, Battalion Commander, Deputy Regiment Commander

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾在红二十八军任职。
description.en: Lin Weixian held positions in the 28th Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾任新四军第四支队参谋长、副司令员。
description.en: Lin Weixian served as the Chief of Staff and Deputy Commander of the 4th Detachment of the New Fourth Army.

position.en: Chief of Staff and Commander of the Advance Regiment

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾任新四军第三支队参谋长兼挺进团团长。
description.en: Lin Weixian served as the Chief of Staff of the 3rd Detachment of the New Fourth Army and Commander of its Advance Regiment.

position.zh-cn: 副参谋长、沿江支队支队长兼中共地委书记，第19旅旅长
position.en: Deputy Chief of Staff, Commander of the Riverside Detachment and Secretary of the CPC Prefectural Committee, Commander of the 19th Brigade

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾在新四军第七师担任多个职务。
description.en: Lin Weixian held multiple positions in the 7th Division of the New Fourth Army.

position.en: Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾任南京军区副司令员兼参谋长。
description.en: Lin Weixian served as the Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff of the Nanjing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 林维先于1969年至1982年担任武汉军区副司令员。
description.en: Lin Weixian served as the Deputy Commander of the Wuhan Military Region from 1969 to 1982.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

description.zh-cn: 林维先曾是中华人民共和国国防委员会委员。
description.en: Lin Weixian was a member of the National Defense Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，中华人民共和国授予林维先一级八一勋章、一级独立自由勋章、一级解放勋章，以表彰其在革命战争中的贡献。
description.en: In 1955, the People's Republic of China awarded Lin Weixian the First Class Medal of Bayi, the First Class Medal of Independence and Freedom, and the First Class Medal of Liberation in recognition of his contributions during the revolutionary wars.
